scripts.logic: cd botlogic && source venv/bin/activate && python3 index.py
scripts.price: cd botprice && source venv/bin/activate && python3 index.py
scripts.watchlist-starter: cd botlogic && source venv/bin/activate && cd scripts && python3 watchlistmaker.py
scripts.deploy-client: git subtree push --prefix botclient botclient main
scripts.deploy-server: git subtree push --prefix botlogic botlogic main
